briefdescription.para: Called when login/signup succeeds Parameters: username, email, authentication token.

parameterdescription.para: Graphics context (unused, kept for override signature)

Auth provides a professional login/signup interface.

detaileddescription.para:
Features:
Clean, card-based layout
Proper TextEditor inputs with styling
Form validation with inline error messages
OAuth provider buttons
Smooth state transitions
Keyboard navigation support
